document.heading: Child and Family Services Grant-Making Amendment Act of 2008

history.narrative: Law 17-199, the “Child and Family Services Grant-Making Amendment Act of 2008”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 17-250 which was referred to the Committee on Human Services. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on April 1, 2008, and May 6, 2008, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on May 23, 2008, it was assigned Act No. 17-396 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 17-199 became effective on July 18, 2008.
